S.FORM: == Ke'-pu-e 喀布爾 == Ke'-pu-e, u A-hu-han a tukay, satabakiay nu Ke'-pu-e sen atu A-hu-han nu tukayan. u tulu a malebut a mihcaan nu likisian a tukayan, caypicpiclu mihcaan mala A-hu-han a tukay. " Ke'-pu-e" itini i Sin-de a kamuan " u pitelungan nu pisiwbayan" a imian. tuseptusep mihcaan, Ke'-pu-e tukay pulung nu tademaw makaala 4,222,000 tademaw. sakalamkamay a kalahadan nu sakalima nu kitakid a tukayan. 喀布爾, . malepacaw i labu atu Ta-li-pan a zitay 內戰與塔利班時期 caysiwsiwtu mihcaah sepat a bulad kainai'an nu laheci nu Na-ci-pu-la sihu, caayan kalecad nu mililiday a tademaw micumud tina tukayan, saan " pay-sa-wa nicudadan" patideng tu sihu, nika ci Ku-li-pu-tin. Si-ke'-ma-ti-ya-e a centan kaisa makakiyaku, sa malangatu masasupacaw maaalaw tiya tukay a kakuwanan, amilik satu masasuad namin. imahini kalingatuan a masasuada kina Ke-pu-e, makaala tu tulu a mangan nu tademaw itini tina " Ke-pu-e lepacaw" a patayan. katukuh i caysiwsiwnem mihcaan, nina niyadau' wal a bataan % mapeci' atu maluyuh, malumanay a tukay atu nutipan u kalawpesan nu kitidaan. 1992年4 . caysiwsiwtu mihcaan tu lalud, macunus ku sakasasuad nu hitay, macunus ku nikalawpes nu Ke'-pu-e. itida aca nu kadecdecan nu dihep ku kakitidaan nu macimacian, sisa kakataydaan nu hitay a mueneng i liwilw nu buyu sawni bakuwangan tu tabakiay a lacu.sayaway nina macian a mikaput atu Si-ke-ti-ya-e a hitay masasuad, nika ilabu masasuada tu, nina ka pulungan amelik a mabulasak.nina tusaay a mihcaan, Ke'-pu-e a tuud mapeleng namin, milaliw namin ku tademaw tayda i inaka atu hekal nu kanatal, nai' ku nanum atu dinki. caysiwsiwsip tu hedek nu mihcaan, masaluimeng ku hitay tu sakay Ke'-pu-e a mibakuhac, apuyu' ku nisaluimeng nu macimacian a hulic atu kawaw. kina cacay aca malingatu kina huing, misuayaw tu sihu nu hitay tu sicumiay a tademaw palasicumian. 1992年夏天, . sakaudip 經濟 Ke'-pu-e tapang a tuudan idaw ku mahka nipelu'an tu heci, nikansuan tu heci, nananuman, A-hu-han a tana', nu sidi a tuud, sakay tumunaw a tuud, sumamaday a dawa atu dikuc. caysiwpicwal mihcaan malingatu ku A-hu-han pihaceng ku lepacaw malalid ku Ke'-pu-e tu sakaudip, katukuh tu Ka-e-ca-yi pikuwanan itida i tusepsepcay mihcaan tu nipatidengan, Ke'-pu-e a sakaudip idaw tu ku cakatan. Kapah ku sakay dadanan, idaw ku dadan nu kulukiwk mitulin tu Ke'-pu-e niyadu' atu hamin nu kanatalan a niyadu'an. ilabu idaw ku kakanen, sabuut, misangaay tu sakay lumaan a tuudan, nituduhan a tuuda atu daylisiki nu kakulian. . Ka-e-cya itida i A-hu-han Walian, Sin-tu-ku'-se buyu' timulan, talakaw caypicsiwcay kun-ce a dihepan nu lalaan, katalawan kya kitidaan, buyubuyuan ku liklik masa wahelu. kakitidaan nu maci cayseptulu pinhunkunli, u satabakiay nu maci a kanatalan. Ka-e-cya sauwac makateban nu macian muculi ku nananum, mapela' ku Ke'-pu'-e-se, timulan u malumanay a tukay, amisan u Sin-cen a tukay. limulak ku Sin-cen, sasasiwbayan, hun-kun, luma nu tapang atu kapahay a luma' itida namin masaupu, yadah ku kun-tin, sasinganganay a kun-ten idaw ku ku-e-han-na-kun, di-e-ku'-sa-kun, sa'-la-ta-te'-kun, cen-wi-kun atu ta-e-man-kun. u kakakaygian ku ta-e-man-kun. tatelungan ku Ke-pu-e a Mea-wan-de macimacian mapatideng ku langdaway a Men-wan-de kakiningan a paya, liwliw nu kakiningan a paya idaw ku sepatay nu tabakiay a lacuna. U . liwliw nu maci a apilis, batu a buyu'an, sumamaday a tangku, sumamaday a lunem, sumamaday a buhung atu Yi-se-lan kiwkay, yadah ku biyu. sakasingangan idaw ku Sa-si-tu-sa-mu-se-la-biyu, Pa-pei-e lunem, kuo-wan Mu-ha-muo-de. D-na-e, Sa-a-lin lunem, Kuo-cya-pu-w-kun, Kaw-ku-puo-w-kun. cen-na a "ca-he'" miyu u Yi-se-lan matatunduhay a sangaan, u Yi-se-lan kiwkay patidengay a tademaw ci A-li a lumaan. micapitu biyaan tut ulu a bataan katukuh tu sepat a bataan a kun-ce idaaw ku tabakiay nu ba'tuan, i teban idaw ku pela' tu tusa a tunduhan, ahebal han cacay a tungduhan, sakamusa u ci A-li ku mialaay tu madicumay a bakan ku sapipela tina ba'tuan sa. . i liklik nina macimacian, yadah ku banaw atu sengesengetan , idaw ku cacay nu tabakiay a banawan atu sengesengetan ngangan han " Kol-e Hashmat Khan" u Ku-cen a wali tumulan. ina lanulanuan yadah ku pinaay nu malebut a In-tu atu Si-puo-li-ya mabahelay nu ayaman nu kasaluimengan a kitidaan, itida i tusepcaypic mihcaan, tidaay a sihu saan tina banawan u dadiputen a kitidaan sa. i tina banawan, makaadih kita tu caayay ka adih nu ayaman, mahida u Cin-dew atu Cen-yi-ti-hu ayaman. Ke'-pu-e duma nu tabakiay a banaw han u Ka-e-cya banaw, itida i teban nu nutipa ami tu siwa a kunlian, u tataydaan nu tidaay atu hekalay nu kanatalan nu midangay a tademaw itida. "Kol-e Hashmat Khan" . Ke'-pu-e u maacakay a kasienawan nu demiadan, i kasienawan sa a sinanum " kahetikan nu suleda" atu lutucan. ya kitidaan i talakaway nu buyu'an, atu nutipan timulan a kitidaan masasulecad, Ke'-pu-e cueded. nu cacayan a mihcaan nu lutucan a Ke'-pu-e sasengetay a demiadan, amica ku diheku nu demiad, pilaludan caay ka senged sa, caay ka caledes, diheku ku sapai' ku labii nu kalahukan nu sadingsingan, sienaw ku kasienawan, cacayay a bulad u untu makaala tu -2.3°C. cacay a mihcaan idaw tu ku cilal, nika payditeken tu untu 12.1 °C ku untu. mikisaba tu A-hu-han tu duma a macimacian. 2.3 °C. 12.1 °C, .

== Ke'-po-e 喀布爾 == Ke'-po-e, o A-ho-han a tokay, satabakiay no Ke'-po-e sen ato A-ho-han no tokayan. o tolo a malebot a mihcaan no likisian a tokayan, caypicpiclo mihcaan mala A-ho-han a tokay. " Ke'-po-e" itini i Sin-de a kamoan " o pitelongan no pisiwbayan" a imian. toseptosep mihcaan, Ke'-po-e tokay polong no tademaw makaala 4,222,000 tademaw. sakalamkamay a kalahadan no sakalima no kitakid a tokayan. 喀布爾, . malepacaw i labo ato Ta-li-pan a zitay 內戰與塔利班時期 caysiwsiwto mihcaah sepat a bolad kainai'an no laheci no Na-ci-po-la siho, caayan kalecad no mililiday a tademaw micomod tina tokayan, saan " pay-sa-wa nicodadan" patideng to siho, nika ci Ko-li-po-tin. Si-ke'-ma-ti-ya-e a centan kaisa makakiyako, sa malangato masasopacaw maaalaw tiya tokay a kakowanan, amilik sato masasoad namin. imahini kalingatoan a masasoada kina Ke-po-e, makaala to tolo a mangan no tademaw itini tina " Ke-po-e lepacaw" a patayan. katokoh i caysiwsiwnem mihcaan, nina niyadao' wal a bataan % mapeci' ato maloyoh, malomanay a tokay ato notipan o kalawpesan no kitidaan. 1992年4 . caysiwsiwto mihcaan to lalod, maconos ko sakasasoad no hitay, maconos ko nikalawpes no Ke'-po-e. itida aca no kadecdecan no dihep ko kakitidaan no macimacian, sisa kakataydaan no hitay a moeneng i liwilw no boyo sawni bakowangan to tabakiay a laco.sayaway nina macian a mikapot ato Si-ke-ti-ya-e a hitay masasoad, nika ilabo masasoada to, nina ka polongan amelik a mabolasak.nina tosaay a mihcaan, Ke'-po-e a tood mapeleng namin, milaliw namin ko tademaw tayda i inaka ato hekal no kanatal, nai' ko nanom ato dinki. caysiwsiwsip to hedek no mihcaan, masaloimeng ko hitay to sakay Ke'-po-e a mibakohac, apoyo' ko nisaloimeng no macimacian a holic ato kawaw. kina cacay aca malingato kina hoing, misoayaw to siho no hitay to sicomiay a tademaw palasicomian. 1992年夏天, . sakaodip 經濟 Ke'-po-e tapang a toodan idaw ko mahka nipelo'an to heci, nikansoan to heci, nananoman, A-ho-han a tana', no sidi a tood, sakay tomonaw a tood, somamaday a dawa ato dikoc. caysiwpicwal mihcaan malingato ko A-ho-han pihaceng ko lepacaw malalid ko Ke'-po-e to sakaodip, katokoh to Ka-e-ca-yi pikowanan itida i tosepsepcay mihcaan to nipatidengan, Ke'-po-e a sakaodip idaw to ko cakatan. Kapah ko sakay dadanan, idaw ko dadan no kolokiwk mitolin to Ke'-po-e niyado' ato hamin no kanatalan a niyado'an. ilabo idaw ko kakanen, saboot, misangaay to sakay lomaan a toodan, nitodohan a tooda ato daylisiki no kakolian. . Ka-e-cya itida i A-ho-han Walian, Sin-to-ko'-se boyo' timolan, talakaw caypicsiwcay kon-ce a dihepan no lalaan, katalawan kya kitidaan, boyoboyoan ko liklik masa wahelo. kakitidaan no maci cayseptolo pinhonkonli, o satabakiay no maci a kanatalan. Ka-e-cya saowac makateban no macian mocoli ko nananom, mapela' ko Ke'-po'-e-se, timolan o malomanay a tokay, amisan o Sin-cen a tokay. limolak ko Sin-cen, sasasiwbayan, hon-kon, loma no tapang ato kapahay a loma' itida namin masaopo, yadah ko kon-tin, sasinganganay a kon-ten idaw ko ko-e-han-na-kon, di-e-ko'-sa-kon, sa'-la-ta-te'-kon, cen-wi-kon ato ta-e-man-kon. o kakakaygian ko ta-e-man-kon. tatelongan ko Ke-po-e a Mea-wan-de macimacian mapatideng ko langdaway a Men-wan-de kakiningan a paya, liwliw no kakiningan a paya idaw ko sepatay no tabakiay a lacona. U . liwliw no maci a apilis, bato a boyo'an, somamaday a tangko, somamaday a lonem, somamaday a bohong ato Yi-se-lan kiwkay, yadah ko biyo. sakasingangan idaw ko Sa-si-to-sa-mo-se-la-biyo, Pa-pei-e lonem, koo-wan Mo-ha-moo-de. D-na-e, Sa-a-lin lonem, Koo-cya-po-w-kon, Kaw-ko-poo-w-kon. cen-na a "ca-he'" miyo o Yi-se-lan matatondohay a sangaan, o Yi-se-lan kiwkay patidengay a tademaw ci A-li a lomaan. micapito biyaan tot olo a bataan katokoh to sepat a bataan a kon-ce idaaw ko tabakiay no ba'toan, i teban idaw ko pela' to tosa a tondohan, ahebal han cacay a tongdohan, sakamosa o ci A-li ko mialaay to madicomay a bakan ko sapipela tina ba'toan sa. . i liklik nina macimacian, yadah ko banaw ato sengesengetan , idaw ko cacay no tabakiay a banawan ato sengesengetan ngangan han " Kol-e Hashmat Khan" o Ko-cen a wali tomolan. ina lanolanoan yadah ko pinaay no malebot a In-to ato Si-poo-li-ya mabahelay no ayaman no kasaloimengan a kitidaan, itida i tosepcaypic mihcaan, tidaay a siho saan tina banawan o dadipoten a kitidaan sa. i tina banawan, makaadih kita to caayay ka adih no ayaman, mahida o Cin-dew ato Cen-yi-ti-ho ayaman. Ke'-po-e doma no tabakiay a banaw han o Ka-e-cya banaw, itida i teban no notipa ami to siwa a konlian, o tataydaan no tidaay ato hekalay no kanatalan no midangay a tademaw itida. "Kol-e Hashmat Khan" . Ke'-po-e o maacakay a kasienawan no demiadan, i kasienawan sa a sinanom " kahetikan no soleda" ato lotocan. ya kitidaan i talakaway no boyo'an, ato notipan timolan a kitidaan masasolecad, Ke'-po-e coeded. no cacayan a mihcaan no lotocan a Ke'-po-e sasengetay a demiadan, amica ko diheko no demiad, pilalodan caay ka senged sa, caay ka caledes, diheko ko sapai' ko labii no kalahokan no sadingsingan, sienaw ko kasienawan, cacayay a bolad o onto makaala to -2.3°C. cacay a mihcaan idaw to ko cilal, nika payditeken to onto 12.1 °C ko onto. mikisaba to A-ho-han to doma a macimacian. 2.3 °C. 12.1 °C, .
